title: One man's road
creator_credit: Robert Kingsbury, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: The life of a First Nations family in reserves, country situations and Sydney. Clive and Ida Williams recall the disadvantages typical of most Aborigines’ lives in New South Wales which prevent full participation in society, and their building a successful life in the city.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Kingsbury, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
